description: Back-formation from assets, from Anglo-Norman asetz, from Old French assez (“enough”). Compare Middle English asseth.

definitionGroups.group: A thing or quality that has value, especially one that generates cash flows.

entries.meaning: (accounting) Any item recorded on the left-hand side of a balance sheet.
(software) Any component, model, process or framework of value that can be leveraged or reused.
(slang, usually in the plural) A woman's breasts or buttocks or a man's genitalia.
examples: Perhaps it is simply common for wives to want their female friends to see their husband nude – especially if he has nice assets. Honestly, I also wanted to see the dick of Brian and Andrew.
